name: Bacon Wrapped Chicken
steps: Flatten chicken. On each chicken piece spread 3 Tbsp cream cheese, dab of butter, sprinkle with salt and pepper. Roll up chicken wrapping a slice of bacon around it. Put in a sprayed 9x13 in pan seam side down. Can use a toothpick to hold together. Bake at 400 F for 35-40 minutes. Can broil for last 5 min.
